import { DayPicker } from "react-day-picker";
import { IconChevronLeft, IconChevronRight } from "@tabler/icons-react";
import type * as React from "react";
import {
    alignment,
    cn,
    colors,
    dimensions,
    flexBox,
    interactivity,
    padding,
    paddingY,
    positioning,
    shape,
    spacing,
    typography,
} from "../../core/core";

export type CalendarProps = React.ComponentProps<typeof DayPicker>;

const calendarStyles = {
    months: cn(flexBox.column, spacing.large),
    month: spacing.large,
    caption: cn(alignment.center, positioning.relative, paddingY.small),
    captionLabel: cn(typography.size.small, typography.weight.medium),
    nav: cn(spacing.small, flexBox.row, alignment.center),
    navButton: cn(
        dimensions.medium,
        colors.transparent,
        padding.extraSmall,
        interactivity.states.hover,
        "opacity-50 hover:opacity-100",
    ),
    navButtonPrevious: cn(positioning.absolute, "left-xs"),
    navButtonNext: cn(positioning.absolute, "right-xs"),
    table: cn(dimensions.fullWidth, "border-collapse", spacing.small),
    headRow: flexBox.row,
    headCell: cn(
        "text-on-surface-variant",
        shape.rounded,
        dimensions.medium,
        typography.weight.regular,
        typography.size.extraSmall,
    ),
    row: cn(flexBox.row, dimensions.fullWidth, "mt-xs"),
    cell: cn(
        dimensions.medium,
        positioning.relative,
        "[&:has([aria-selected].day-range-end)]:rounded-r-default",
        "[&:has([aria-selected].day-outside)]:bg-surface-variant/50",
        "[&:has([aria-selected])]:bg-primary-container",
        "first:[&:has([aria-selected])]:rounded-l-default",
        "last:[&:has([aria-selected])]:rounded-r-default",
        "focus-within:relative focus-within:z-20",
    ),
    day: cn(
        dimensions.fullWidth,
        dimensions.medium,
        alignment.center,
        typography.weight.regular,
        shape.rounded,
        interactivity.states.clickable,
        interactivity.transitions.colors,
        "hover:bg-primary-container hover:text-on-primary-container",
        "[&[aria-selected='true']]:bg-primary",
        "[&[aria-selected='true']]:text-on-primary",
        "[&[aria-selected='true']]:hover:bg-primary",
        "[&[aria-selected='true']]:hover:text-on-primary",
    ),
    daySelected: colors.primary,
    dayToday: cn(
        "[&:not([aria-selected='true'])]:bg-surface-variant",
        "[&:not([aria-selected='true'])]:text-on-surface-variant",
    ),
    dayOutside: cn(
        "text-on-surface-variant",
        "opacity-50",
        "aria-selected:bg-surface-variant/50",
        "aria-selected:text-on-surface-variant",
        "aria-selected:opacity-30",
    ),
    dayDisabled: cn("text-on-surface-variant", "opacity-50"),
    dayRangeMiddle: cn(
        "aria-selected:bg-primary-container",
        "aria-selected:text-on-primary-container",
    ),
    dayHidden: "invisible",
};

const Calendar = ({
    className,
    classNames,
    showOutsideDays = true,
    ...props
}: CalendarProps) => (
    <DayPicker
        showOutsideDays={showOutsideDays}
        className={cn(padding.medium, className)}
        classNames={{
            months: calendarStyles.months,
            month: calendarStyles.month,
            caption: calendarStyles.caption,
            caption_label: calendarStyles.captionLabel,
            nav: calendarStyles.nav,
            nav_button: calendarStyles.navButton,
            nav_button_previous: calendarStyles.navButtonPrevious,
            nav_button_next: calendarStyles.navButtonNext,
            table: calendarStyles.table,
            head_row: calendarStyles.headRow,
            head_cell: calendarStyles.headCell,
            row: calendarStyles.row,
            cell: calendarStyles.cell,
            day: calendarStyles.day,
            day_range_end: "day-range-end",
            day_selected: calendarStyles.daySelected,
            day_today: calendarStyles.dayToday,
            day_outside: calendarStyles.dayOutside,
            day_disabled: calendarStyles.dayDisabled,
            day_range_middle: calendarStyles.dayRangeMiddle,
            day_hidden: calendarStyles.dayHidden,
            ...classNames,
        }}
        components={{
            Chevron: ({ orientation }) => {
                const Icon = orientation === "left" ? IconChevronLeft : IconChevronRight;
                return <Icon className={cn(dimensions.medium)} />;
            },
        }}
        {...props}
    />
);
Calendar.displayName = "Calendar";

export { Calendar };
